page.title: 05FISH AND CHIP SHOP
page.content: The owners were born in Hong Kong but they lived in Harrow .The fish and chip shop has always been a fish and chip shop.The busiest day is Friday.It is mostly busy between 5.30 and 7.00. They sell mostly Cod but they do not like fish and chips themselves.They have plenty of helpers. In the summer it is very busy because ofthe tourists that come in the summer months. The shop is open every day except Sunday. They start work at 10.00 and finish work at 4.00. They have been at the shop for 3 years. And they like living there because it is quiet. The lady could speak English very well but her brother could not.The chips they sell are 30p.
